casebody.data:
IRVING TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee In Bankruptcy of SONORA PRODUCTS CORPORATION OF AMERICA (formerly Known as Acoustic Products Company), a Delaware Corporation, Bankrupt, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Percy L. DEUTSCH et al., Defendants, and Harris Hammond and Victor C. Bell, Defendants-Appellants. No. 206. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit Feb. 1, 1937. See, also, 73 F.(2d) 121. Sapinsley & Lukas, of New York City (Edwin J. Lukas, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant Harris Hammond. Ernst, Gale, Bernays & Falk, of New .York City (Murray C. Bernays and Abraham Friedman, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
